p.k: Honoria faces up to the reality of her father's situation - will she throw everything away to save him? Bucket's patience is finally rewarded. UK (2015). Cast: Stephen Rea, Tuppence Middleton, Mark Stanley, Robert Wilfort, Ben Starr, Tom Weston-Jones, Omid Djalili, Caroline Quentin, Pauline Collins, Wilson Radjou-Pujalte, Ned Dennehy, Adrian Rawlins, Jennifer Hennessy, Anton Lesser, Ellie Haddington, Alexandra Moen, Karl Johnson, Sophie Rundle, Peter Firth, John Heffernan, Richard Ridings, Bethany Muir, Imogen Faires, Christopher Fairbank, Richard Cordery. Director: Mark Brozel.
